meanings.definition: A young woman who works as a seamstress or dressmaker.
meanings.sent1: The midinettes in the shop were busy sewing beautiful dresses.
meanings.sent2: The midinettes gathered around the sewing machine to work on the new design.
meanings.sent3: The midinettes giggled as they accidentally pricked their fingers with the needles.
meanings.sent4: The midinettes' fingers danced like butterflies on the fabric, creating magic.
meanings.sent5: The midinettes' passion for fashion shone through their meticulous stitching.

meanings.definition: A group of young women who work as seamstresses or dressmakers.
meanings.sent1: The bustling workshop was filled with the chatter of the midinettes.
meanings.sent2: The midinettes collaborated seamlessly to finish the order on time.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous midinettes played a prank on their supervisor by switching the threads.
meanings.sent4: The unity among the midinettes was a tapestry of support and friendship.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of the midinettes echoed through the atelier, creating a joyful atmosphere.
